Manchester United Credit Card
It's not just in your wallet, it's in your heart
Your passion for the sport and your loyalty for the Red Devils now comes with a host of rewards, benefits and privileges, with the only football-loving Credit Card in the UAE.
Chance to win couple tickets to watch a live match at Old Trafford
Bon Appétit - an exclusive dining experience
Earn 10X RED Points on sports goods, 5X RED Points on dining spends Earn 2X on all international spends

metadata.title: Manchester United Credit Card - Unleash Your Fan Spirit | Emirates NBD

content:
Bon Appétit - an exclusive dining experience
Earn 10X RED Points on sports goods, 5X RED Points on dining spends Earn 2X on all international spends
Effective 1 June 2025, new application for Manchester United Credit Card will no longer be accepted.  Existing cardholders will continue to enjoy all the benefits and features associated with their cards without interruption.

metadata.title: Manchester United Credit Card - Unleash Your Fan Spirit | Emirates NBD

content:
The highest spenders are rewarded every month, quarter and year with exclusive merchandise and a chance to watch matches live
Every month
3 highest spenders every month will get*:
Highest spender - team signed jersey
Second-highest spender - individual signed jersey
Third-highest spender – 50,000 RED Points
Every quarter
9 highest spenders every quarter will get a fully paid trip to watch the match live.
Every calendar year
6 highest spenders of the season will get:
4 highest spenders get couple tickets for a fully paid trip to watch the team training at Old Trafford as well as hospitality tickets to watch the team play live
2 highest spenders get couple tickets for a fully paid trip with hospitality match tickets to watch the team play live
Be the one among the highest spenders - opt in and get spending with your Manchester United Credit Card
Anniversary gift
Guarantee yourself with a lifetime gift that money can’t buy on an annual spend of  250,000 in a calendar year.

metadata.title: Manchester United Credit Card - Unleash Your Fan Spirit | Emirates NBD

content:
Anniversary gift
Guarantee yourself with a lifetime gift that money can’t buy on an annual spend of  250,000 in a calendar year.
*Limited period offer. Offer valid till stocks last. Please refer to the Man U terms and conditions for more details.
Red deals
Cheer your team with discounts at restaurants and experiences
Go Red and get exclusive discounts at restaurants and deals on your visit to The Theatre of Dreams
Know more
Cheer your team with discounts at restaurants and experiences
Go Red and get exclusive discounts at restaurants and deals on your visit to The Theatre of Dreams
Support the champions and enjoy great deals on your visit to The Theatre of Dreams*
10% discount on total bill at Red Café, Old Trafford
20% discount on Manchester United Stadium and Museum tour
10% discount on Official Membership
*Only applicable if purchased using Emirates NBD Man United Credit Card, applicable only if purchased directly from Manchester United. Offer not applicable on online purchase.

Security cheque

metadata.title: Manchester United Credit Card - Unleash Your Fan Spirit | Emirates NBD

content:
Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage.

0.99% monthly fee of your card's outstanding balance
Up to  300,000 decease cover per cardholder
 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization
